021import net.tnemc.item.JSONHelper;
022import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
023
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.Arrays;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Objects;
028
029/**
030 * ExplosionData
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.2.0.0
034 */
035public class ExplosionData {
036
037  protected String shape; // small_ball, large_ball, star, creeper, burst
038  protected final List<Integer> colors = new ArrayList<>();
039  protected final List<Integer> fadeColors = new ArrayList<>();
040  protected boolean hasTrail;
041  protected boolean hasTwinkle;
042
043  public ExplosionData() {
044
045  }
046
047  public ExplosionData(final String shape, final boolean hasTrail, final boolean hasTwinkle) {
048
049    this.shape = shape;
050    this.hasTrail = hasTrail;
051    this.hasTwinkle = hasTwinkle;
052  }
053
054  public ExplosionData(final String shape, final boolean hasTrail, final boolean hasTwinkle, final List<Integer> colors, final List<Integer> fadeColors) {
055
056    this.shape = shape;
057    this.hasTrail = hasTrail;
058    this.hasTwinkle = hasTwinkle;
059    this.colors.addAll(colors);
060    this.fadeColors.addAll(fadeColors);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Converts this explosion data to a JSON object.
065   *
066   * @return The JSONObject representing this explosion data.
067   */
068  public JSONObject toJSON() {
069    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
070    json.put("shape", shape);
071    json.put("colors", colors);
072    json.put("fade_colors", fadeColors);
073    json.put("has_trail", hasTrail);
074    json.put("has_twinkle", hasTwinkle);
075    return json;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Reads JSON data and populates this explosion data.
080   *
081   * @param json The JSONHelper instance of the JSON data.
082   */
083  public void readJSON(final JSONHelper json) {
084    shape = json.getString("shape");
085
086    colors.clear();
087    colors.addAll(json.getIntegerList("colors"));
088
089    fadeColors.clear();
090    fadeColors.addAll(json.getIntegerList("fade_colors"));
091
092    hasTrail = json.getBoolean("has_trail");
093    hasTwinkle = json.getBoolean("has_twinkle");
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public boolean equals(final Object obj) {
098    if (!(obj instanceof final ExplosionData other)) return false;
099
100    return Objects.equals(this.shape, other.shape) &&
101           Objects.equals(this.colors, other.colors) &&
102           Objects.equals(this.fadeColors, other.fadeColors) &&
103           this.hasTrail == other.hasTrail &&
104           this.hasTwinkle == other.hasTwinkle;
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  public int hashCode() {
109    return Objects.hash(shape, colors, fadeColors, hasTrail, hasTwinkle);
110  }
111
112  public String shape() {
113
114    return shape;
115  }
116
117  public void shape(final String shape) {
118
119    this.shape = shape;
120  }
121
122  public List<Integer> colors() {
123
124    return colors;
125  }
126
127  public void colors(final List<Integer> colors) {
128
129    this.colors.clear();
130    this.colors.addAll(colors);
131  }
132
133  public void colors(final Integer... colors) {
134
135    this.colors.clear();
136    this.colors.addAll(Arrays.asList(colors));
137  }
138
139  public List<Integer> fadeColors() {
140
141    return fadeColors;
142  }
143
144  public void fadeColors(final List<Integer> colors) {
145
146    this.fadeColors.clear();
147    this.fadeColors.addAll(colors);
148  }
149
150  public void fadeColors(final Integer... colors) {
151
152    this.fadeColors.clear();
153    this.fadeColors.addAll(Arrays.asList(colors));
154  }
155
156  public boolean hasTrail() {
157
158    return hasTrail;
159  }
160
161  public void hasTrail(final boolean hasTrail) {
162
163    this.hasTrail = hasTrail;
164  }
165
166  public boolean hasTwinkle() {
167
168    return hasTwinkle;
169  }
170
171  public void hasTwinkle(final boolean hasTwinkle) {
172
173    this.hasTwinkle = hasTwinkle;
174  }
175}
